title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála 

Teanga Ghaeltachta a Ainmniú) (Uimh. 6), 2022 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na gaeltachta 2012 (limisteir pleanala teanga ghaeltachta ainmniu) (uimh 6) 2022 ghairm den ordu seo

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Tá an limistéar a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar
text_raw:
2. Tá an limistéar a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar 
Pleanála Teanga Ghaeltachta chun críocha alt 7(2) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 
(Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 9 Nollaig, 2022, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [636] 3 

Limistéar Pleanála Teanga: Oileáin Árann, Co. na Gaillimhe 

SCEIDEAL 

(1) An toghroinn ceantair seo a leanas: Árainn. 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh,, 
 7 Nollaig 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, 

Spóirt agus Meán 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [636] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 636 of 2022 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 6) ORDER 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [636] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 636 of 2022 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 6) ORDER 2022 

I, Jack Chambers, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 
7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the Culture, 
Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of 
Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
text_norm: 2 ta limistear shonraitear sa sceideal ainmnithe mar limistear pleanala teanga ghaeltachta chun criocha alt 7(2) acht na gaeltachta 2012 (uimh 34 de 2012) foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 9 nollaig 2022 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo 636 3 limistear pleanala teanga oileain arann co na gaillimhe sceideal (1) toghroinn ceantair seo leanas arainn arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 7 nollaig 2022 jack chamber aire stait ag roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean 4 636 official translation tiontu oifigiuil statutory instrument s.i no 636 2022 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 6) order 2022 636 5 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 636 2022 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 6) order 2022 jack chamber minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) (as adapted culture heritage gaeltacht (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (s.i no 403 2020)) tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020 (s.i no 547 2020) hereby order follows

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Language Planning Areas) (No. 6) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 6) order 2022

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. The area specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. The area specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Language Planning Area for the purposes of section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 
2012 (No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [636] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

Language Planning Area: Oileáin Árann, Co. Galway
text_norm: 2 area specified schedule designated gaeltacht language planning area purpose section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th december 2022 6 636 official translation tiontu oifigiuil language planning area oileain arann co galway

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: (1) The following electoral division area: Árainn.
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

(1) The following electoral division area: Árainn. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 7 December 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [636] 7
